Articles.Content:
The Russian counterpart to the Meteor and Me-262, the Mig-9 is historically accurate relative to their performance. It is heavier, but with more power.

Features:

Twin 20 mm cannons

Great flight attributes above 50 m/s

Great turning

Looks great

Seats one

Very stable above 50 m/s

Javascript is disabled. View full album

http://www./download/61wm0vqvsnj17kp/MiG-9_Replica-ish.craft

You need to stop playing so much War Thunder.

Lovely replica of an aircraft that has always fascinated me, if only because it's so very strange in every way. Good work!

I stopped playing high tier war thunder 3 months ago because of the grind. Hence, I do this now. I agree, this thing is strange. I still wonder why it has no conventional design.Thank you very much!

Edited September 14, 2015 by Alphasus
